note:
Quaker, Systems Engineer, Choir and folk singer (non-pro), . .

I grew up in "South Jersey," (aka Southern New Jersey, fka the Quaker colony of West Jersey, 1674-1703), and have published a bit on that history ( westjersey.org ). Still consider myself a historian/archivist in training.

Since 2018 living with my spouse in a town outside of Ottawa, Ontario. We do virtual singalong each week
( westjersey.org/TheSing/about )
Online kitchen party, not performance!
